dialogues.Wilson:
[1]Good Morning... 
[2]I hereby present a motion to meet privately with my seven fellow Heads of State, kindly excluding the rest of the delegates. 
[3]Mr. President, judging from the conversations we've had in the past, I can assure you, your English is absolutely fine, for what I have to say. 
[4]Six months ago I was made aware of a situation so devastating, that at first, I refused to believe it. However through the concerted efforts of the brightest scientists of several nations, we have now confirmed its validity. 
[5]The world as we know it, will soon come to an end. 
[6]It's alright Sally. 
[7]Honey, calm down. 
[8]Is this even possible? What's our information from China? 
[9]Only four? 
[10]I'd rather have Adrian do that. They trust him. I told him to be in on the meeting. 
[11]Ladies and Gentlemen, we all knew this day would come. But we never imagined it would come this soon. 
[12]I would like to pass this over to my science advisor, Adrian Helmsley. 
[13]Nevertheless, Mr. Antonioni, we have to make an immediate decision. 
[14]Now matter how idealistic you are taking office. You lose your innocence behind that desk. Laura was right. People have died because of the decisions I made. 
[15]You sound like Anheuser. 
[16]Laura's never looked at me like that before. Only once... When I told her, her mother had died. You knew the first lady? 
[17]You know what she said to me that night we brought her to the hospital? `Tommy... I think you should do a lottery. Every one should have a chance to go'. That's what Dorothy said to me. That's what we should have done. 
[18]You know what I believe, Adrian. I believe nature should choose for itself, from itself. 
[19]Don't let her go. You'll regret it if you do. Prove to Laura what kind of a man you are. And I'll do the same... You go now. And watch your back for Anheuser. 
[20]Go. That's an order Helmsley. 
[21]Would you tell my daughter... there's nothing on earth that I cherish more than her. 
[22]Sally, can you take care of them. I'll go check with the Red Cross... 
[23]Who can help me with missing persons? 
[24]Don't worry about it. You're doing a great job son... 
[25]I'm coming home Dorothy...

[28]... It seems all other Heads of State are en route, however there are unconfirmed reports that the Italian Prime Minister has also decided to stay behind and trust in prayer rather than action...

[31]Would our science advisor care to give us his assessment? 
[32]So Helmsley, what you're telling us here is that... the north pole is now somewhere in Wisconsin?
